Package me.nabdev.oxidation

Class State

java.lang.Object
me.nabdev.oxidation.State
public abstract class State extends Object
A state in a state machine.

    • withModeTransitions

      public State withModeTransitions(State disabled, State teleop, State auto, State test)
      Configure mode transitions for this state.
      Parameters:
      disabled - The state to transition to when disabled
      teleop - The state to transition to when teleop is enabled
      auto - The state to transition to when auto is enabled
      test - The state to transition to when test is enabled

    • withModeTransitions

      public State withModeTransitions(State disabled, State teleop, State test)
      Configure mode transitions for this state, using tele as the auto state.
      Parameters:
      disabled - The state to transition to when disabled
      teleop - The state to transition to when teleop is enabled
      auto - The state to transition to when auto is enabled
      test - The state to transition to when test is enabled

    • activeTrg

      protected SmartTrigger activeTrg()
      WARNING - activeTrg does not experience a rising edge, so it will not fire! Use only with runWhileTrue and runWhileFalse, or compositions.
      Returns:
      A trigger that is active while this state is active
